Key Match Events: Matt Wallner homered for the second straight game
Brooks Lee snapped an 0-for-19 stretch with a go-ahead, two-run double
Royce Lewis nearly had his sixth career grand slam but it was overturned to a double
Post-Match Reflections: Matt Wallner said the team felt good about their performance
Rocco Baldelli noted the offense was brewing and the team was locked in
Miscellaneous Highlights: Minnesota Twins remain six games behind Cleveland in the AL Central
Los Angeles Angels have lost four of five games
Jack Kochanowicz allowed four runs in 5 2/3 innings for the Angels
Others: Brandon Drury left the game with left hamstring tightness
Bryce Teodosio sustained a small finger fracture
Byron Buxton activated from the 10-day injured list
